subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 2
subSections.text: {{IPAchar|/-pe/}} → {{IPAchar|/-ɸe/}} → {{IPAchar|/-we/}} → {{IPAchar|/-e/}}. Cognate with {{m|ja|重|tr=he||division}}. The divergent phonological development is due to the non-null environment caused by being suffixed to the previous morpheme.

{{ja-pos|じゅう|prefix}}

# [[heavy]], [[weighty]]
# involving large-scale manufacture, [[heavy]]
# great in degree, [[heavy]], [[serious]], [[severe]]
